Credit Line: The Jefferson R. Burdick Collection, Gift of Jefferson R. Burdick
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: The United States and Canada, 1800–1900 A.D.
Description: Large trade cards from the "Presidential Baseball Club" series (N154), issued in 1888 by W. Duke Sons & Co. to promote Honest Long Cut Tobacco. The series places the heads of Presidential candidates from the 1888 election superimposed on baseball players' bodies.
